Claim: "Habitat loss and human predation are a far greater problem for most animals."
Implication: "Elephants won't make it to see a warmer climate."
Referring expressions: Habitat loss, human predation, most animals.  Elephants, warmer climate
Formula: (exists c (exists b (exists a (IsHabitatLoss(a) and (IsHumanPredation(b) and IsMostAnimals(c)))))) -> (exists d (exists e (IsInElephants(d) and ~WillSee(d,e))))
